RumorFact.Text: Solanum want me to find her at the Ash Twin Project, she want to take a look at the Time Loop control panel.

ExploreFact.Text: Solanum is already here, observing time loop ring's logs.
She just realized I'm in the time loop and our Sun will explode soon. With charged warp core we potentially can try to escape from explosion. Seems like we will met again on the Vessel.
